attributes.action: Review the case of Al Hassan Bangura to remain in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to review the case of Al Hassan Bangura denying him leave of stay in the United Kingdom and to deport him back to Sierra Leone, where he would face almost certain death. Al Hassan escaped this country when he was 15 and in the process sexually assaulted and only found safety when allowed to take refuge. Now he is 19 his application to remain in this country has been denied. This is a travesty and we seek the overturning of this ruling.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
